question: What is the only Country where both Tigers and Lions are found?
hints: It is home to 70 percent of tigers in the world
aboutAnswer:
India is home to 70 percent of tigers in the world. In 2006, there were 1,411 tigers which increased to 1,706 in 2010 and 2,226 in 2014.
The Asiatic lion is a Panthera leo leo population in India. Its range is restricted to the Gir National Park and environs in the Indian state of Gujarat.
